resources.string: AhaBus.com is the only realtime bus ticket Booking portal in Nepal where you will find different options for bus seats, routes and bus types on the site.\n We guarantee your reservations and comfortable travel experience.

>Book bus tickets with a single click within minutes without visiting bus station or ticket counters.
 >Choose buses and your seat freely, everything is on your control.
 >You can choose buses based on boarding points, timing and bus type, choose where fits you the best.
 >You can choose many bus operators and route at a time.
 >You can cancel your ticket in case of emergency as per the cancellation policy, you are always in safe hands. Please read TnC for more details.
 >Payment flexibility, pay us via different online payment methods, or by using book now pay later, bank deposit, pay to driver and many more.
 >You can also hold your tickets for certain time .
